entries.name: COMPONENT
entries.desc: An Array of the available components for URI::FTP.

entries.name: DEFAULT_PORT
entries.desc: A Default port of 21 for URI::FTP.

entries.name: TYPECODE
entries.desc:
Typecode is “a”, “i”, or “d”.

“a” indicates a text file (the FTP command was
ASCII)

“i” indicates a binary file (FTP command IMAGE)

“d” indicates the contents of a directory should be displayed

entries.name: build(args)
entries.desc: Creates a new URI::FTP object from components, with syntax checking.

entries.name: new(scheme, userinfo, host, port, registry, path, opaque, query, fragment, parser = nil, arg_check = false)
entries.desc: Creates a new URI::FTP object from generic URL components with no syntax checking.

entries.name: path()
entries.desc: Returns the path from an FTP URI.

entries.name: to_s()
entries.desc: Returns a String representation of the URI::FTP.
